parsed.title: O boneco que carrega séculos de ódio
parsed.summary: Um simples brinquedo de plástico reproduz a pose de um santo infantil medieval. Enquanto a imagem viaja da gravura do século XV às linhas de produção modernas, surge a inquietante pergunta: como um símbolo de perseguição pode se tornar um objeto de consumo inocente? O mistério permanece aberto, ecoando a injustiça que atravessa séculos.

scenes.narration: Um boneco de plástico, idêntico ao santo infantil, repousa entre relíquias antigas.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, plastic saint figurine placed on a dusty wooden altar surrounded by ancient relics, low-key lighting casting deep shadows, somber atmosphere
scenes.motionDescription: Slow dolly forward toward the altar, candle flames flickering softly, dust particles drifting in the dim light
scenes.audioDescription: soft echoing footsteps, distant creak of wooden floor, low ambient hum

scenes.narration: A mesma pose aparece gravada em xilogravuras do século XV, antigas, silenciosas.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, faded 15th‑century woodcut of the child saint, illuminated by a narrow beam of light, shadows dancing across the parchment
scenes.motionDescription: Gentle camera pan left across the woodcut, subtle paper fibers rustling in the air
scenes.audioDescription: quiet rustle of parchment, faint distant church bells with reverb

scenes.narration: Hoje, máquinas imprimem milhares desses bonecos, espalhando a imagem como mercadoria global.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, industrial factory line with rows of plastic molding machines, each producing the saint figurine, cold metallic surfaces reflecting muted light
scenes.motionDescription: Slow dolly right along the conveyor belt, plastic parts glinting as they move, occasional steam puff drifting
scenes.audioDescription: steady mechanical whirring, low hum of machinery, occasional clang of metal

scenes.narration: A criança brinca, inconsciente de que segura um símbolo de milênios de ódio.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, modern playroom dimly lit, child holding the plastic saint, background wall briefly flashes a 1493 woodcut for a split second, creating a fleeting ghostly overlay
scenes.motionDescription: Subtle zoom in on child's hands, rapid flash of woodcut overlay lasting a heartbeat, then fade back
scenes.audioDescription: soft child laughter, faint echo of distant chanting, brief high‑pitched chime during flash

scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, black screen with centered white serif text "The Gap Files." fading in slowly, no additional elements
scenes.motionDescription: Static frame, text fade‑in over three seconds, then hold

backgroundMusic.prompt: Dark Ambient, Low Drone Synths, Sparse Piano Notes, Tension Strings, Eerie Pads, Subtle Heartbeat Rhythm, Minor Key, well-arranged composition, 70 BPM
